1.Phone > Play Movie
2.tap into local and let it play through
3.tap into reomte streaming

results: shows the video from local (3.1.3) or plays a second or so of audio (4+) fomr previous clip

fields.summary: iOS: remote streaming video following local - shows frame from previous video before playing 3.1.3, plays audio from previous clip 4.3

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress in the past 5 years.
